model

Class NPCStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.NPCStrategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPCDerbyStrategy, NPCWinStrategy

    abstract class NPCStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    Super class for all NPCStrategies.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk Created on 3/6/2015.
